name: Shibuya Sukeban
storyline: The year is 2008, the world is cracked apart, shattered from nuclear fire and war, from this brought Satan's army onto humanity, giving the people endless power bringing forth more death. Japan is one of the last havens that has yet to have been demolished under terrorism, but that will change soon if somebody doesn't stop it. You are "Miki Sato", one of these demons resurrected from hell, you will work together with a mysterious man known as "Chris Clarke", to bring down the people bringing hell upon Tokyo.
summary: "Shibuya Sukeban" is a total conversion mod for Hotline Miami that aims to bring the stylization of Japanese manga and animes, into a faster paced and adrenaline fueled twist onto the regular formula, along with visual novel styled storytelling. You'll be fighting dozens of triad goons across 10 levels, along with unique bosses that will challenge your skill. Will you save anyone, or will you fail to save yourself?
